One morning, Izuku wakes up in his dorm room, feeling very strange. He could see every peice of All Might merchandise throught the entire room. He could see everything! Panicing, he tried calling out for help, only to find no mouth to make noise.

[W-What's going on?!]

He tried moving, sliding off the bed and onto the floor. Then, moving towards the mirror, he sticks to the side of it and rolls up, to discover he's a small, green blob of slime! Freaking out, he falls onto the floor

[Is... is this my initial quirk..?]

He decides that someone may be able to help him, and rolls over to the door, squeezing under it and into one of the dorm's hallways. But... who should he go to?

info.brief_description: The students of U.A. Academy are in for a suprise when one discovers a new, secret quirk
info.description:
A student of U.A. wakes up one day and discovers a new, hidden quirk: they can turn into slime and possess people!

-------RULES-------
No death or extreme violence (except with the Toga path)
No ending the story: If I see that a story has finished, I'll end it.
I reserve the right to erase any chapter and add more rules.

Edit: This made the first page of a "possession" search! Thank you, all you viewers, for this personal milestone!
